titleStmt.title: Londons mourning garment, or funerall teares worne and shed for the death of her wealthy cittizens, and other her inhabitants. To which is added, a zealous and feruent prayer, with a true relation how many haue dyed of all diseases, in euery particuler parish within London, the liberties, and out parishes neere adioyning from the 14 of Iuly 1603. to the 17 of Nouember. following.
titleStmt.author: Muggins, William.

notesStmt.note: "A true relation of al that haue bin buried of all diseases ..", quire E.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
